description: This file contains JSON serialization and deserialization functions for various OVS_MAP and OVS_DMAP types, including handling for different data types such as integers, booleans, doubles, strings, and UUIDs. It provides generic handlers for converting complex map structures between JSON and internal representations, with support for optional updating.
